channel.title: Documentation Updates
channel.description:
[html]

The documentation on the wiki saw many changes lately. Thanks to all who contributed.

Changelog: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM/Installation_Screenshots https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VoIP https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services_Guides https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hidden_Services#Hidden_Service_Authentication https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Local_Connections https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnel_Proxy_or_SSH_or_VPN_through_Tor#Tor_Browser_Proxy_Configuration https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key#Download_the_key https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Avoid_non-Free_Software https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Avoid_Unsigned_Software https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Comparison_Of_Tor_with_CGI_Proxies,_Proxy_Chains,_and_VPN_Services#Comparison_of_Tor_and_VPN_services https://www.whonix.org/wiki/E-Mail#Icedove_.28Mozilla_Thunderbird.29_with_Enigmail_.2B_TorBirdy https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Mixmaster#Nymserver_How-To https://www.whonix.org/wiki/OnionCat https://www.whonix.org/wiki/I2P https://www.whonix.org/wiki/YaCy

[/html]
